postReview.title: Manchester City 5-2 Crystal Palace: De Bruyne inspires turnaround to boost Champions League hopes
postReview.description: Manchester City boosted their Champions League qualification hopes, recovering from a shaky start before soaring past Crystal Palace.

preReview.title: Preview: Man City and Crystal Palace kick off the Premier League weekend

QAData.question: Who won between Manchester City and Crystal Palace on Sat, 12 Apr 2025 11:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Manchester City won 5–2 over Crystal Palace on Sat, 12 Apr 2025 11:30:00 GMT.
